Fatiha Berber (1945-2015) bụ onye Algeria na-eme ihe nkiri maka ụlọ ihe nkiri na telivishọn, onye ezigbo aha ya bụ Fatiha Blal
A mụrụ Fatiha Berber na Casbah nke Algiers. Ezinụlọ ya si Legata na Boumerdès Province nke Northern Algeria.
Na ngwụcha afọ 1950 ọ bụrụ abụ na ndị egwú nke Meriem Fekkaï, tupu ọ mụọ ihe nkiri na Conservatory nke Algiers
Onye nduzi Mustapha Gribi nyere ya ọrụ mbụ ya, na mgbanwe nke Molière, Les femmes savantes
O sonyere na ọgụ nnwere onwe mba Algeria.
Ọ nwụrụ n'abalị 16 ọnwa Jenụwarị afọ 2015 na Paris, mgbe ọ nwesịrị nkụchi obi.
